story.title: Vietnam
story.text: This is where I was born.

story.title: Singapore
story.text: I took the opportunity to have an academic exchange semester in Singapore.

story.title: Alberta, Canada
story.text: I stated a new chapter in my life when I was 18. I'm currently here and pursuing a BSc. (Hons) in Computing Science.

story.title: Beijing, China
story.text: I traveled to Beijing on a cultural exchange opportunity in the Summer of 2013. The trip was organized by https://cungthieunhi.org.vn/, an organization in which I had my training in table tennis. Fees were covered by fundings from the correspondent organization in China (which is pretty sweet ðŸ˜‹).
